questiones.question: Do you have a physical or mental disability as defined by the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA), that substantially limits one or more major life activities?

fields.name: disability
fields.label: Do you have a physical or mental disability as defined by the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA), that substantially limits one or more major life activities

questiones.sectionHint: This section is about your disability status Information.
questiones.questionHint: Yes: If you have a disability that affects activities such as walking, hearing, seeing, speaking, learning, etc.No: If you do not have any such disability.

questiones.question: Would you like to provide further details about your disability or its impact on your participation?

fields.name: disability_impact
fields.label: Would you like to provide further details about your disability or its impact on your participation

questiones.sectionHint: This section is about your disability status Information.
questiones.questionHint: Yes: If you would like to share additional information about your disability and how it may affect your participation.No: If you do not wish to provide further details at this time.Please select either 'Yes' or 'No.'

questiones.question: Which of the following best describes your disability?
questiones.sectionHint: This section is about your disability status Information.
questiones.questionHint: Could you please indicate your disability by checking all that apply?

questiones.sectionHint: This section is about your Personal Identifying Information.
questiones.questionHint: Does everything look good so far? Feel free to make any corrections. Otherwise, click 'Confirm' to proceed or 'Previous' to go back.
